title: Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
description: All the contents of the perspective (views, layout info) are lost when the following actions are performed in F1: Maximize a view in any perspective. Only the maximized view is actually present and all other views are missing from the perspective. It seems that the view maximize code replaces the page layout with a temporary one that contains only the maximized view.
OB: When a view is maximized in any perspective, all other views and layout information in the perspective are lost.
SR: To reproduce the issue, switch to another perspective, exit the workbench, then open the workbench again and switch to the perspective with the maximized view.
